name: Haunted House on 43rd Street
description:
Ludum Dare 40 entry

Didn't get much time to work on my game this time as I flew away with family to celebrate Christmas early. Also decided that this time I would create something with my 7 year old Nephew. So he came up with the idea and story. I did the art and tried to bring it all together.  Also made for Portrait mode on mobile cause he wanted to play it on that.

It's an unfinished mess but he had a great time making it, so it was my funnest time doing one of these. 

The game is a choose your own adventure in a haunted house where the more options you have the worse the game is.

Updated with a mute button to stop all sounds and music. Just press M.

Updated with an alternate Windows version cause I've heard from someone that the Windows version just shows a white screen for them. Hopefully this version works instead.
